settings.hero_subtitle: New professional development courses coming soon to advance your safety career

settings.content_body:
We're developing new courses to meet the evolving needs of safety professionals in the entertainment and adventure industry. Each course is designed by industry experts to provide practical, applicable knowledge that you can immediately apply in your workplace.

Our development process ensures every course meets the highest standards of professional education while addressing real-world challenges faced by safety professionals today.

settings.section_subtitle: Each course is carefully developed by industry experts and includes hands-on learning components

settings.block_title: Advanced Risk Assessment for Adventure Operations
settings.block_content:
Target Release: Q3 2025

Master comprehensive risk analysis methodologies specifically designed for adventure tourism and family entertainment facilities. This course teaches systematic approaches to identifying, assessing, and mitigating operational risks while maintaining the excitement that guests expect.

Course Details:
Duration: 4 hours
CEU Credits: 3.0
Format: Interactive online with case studies

Target Release: Q4 2025

Develop advanced leadership skills for managing emergency situations in entertainment and adventure facilities. Learn crisis communication strategies, team coordination techniques, and post-incident management procedures that protect both guests and your organization.

Course Details:
Duration: 6 hours
CEU Credits: 4.0
Format: Blended learning with simulation exercises

Target Release: Q3 2025

Navigate the digital transformation of safety management with comprehensive training on technology integration, data management, and digital workflow optimization. Learn to leverage modern tools for enhanced safety monitoring and compliance tracking.

Course Details:
Duration: 3 hours
CEU Credits: 2.5
Format: Online with software demonstrations

Target Release: Q2 2025

Master safety protocols for seasonal entertainment facilities, addressing unique challenges of temporary installations, weather considerations, variable staffing, and peak-season operations. Essential for facilities with seasonal operations or outdoor attractions.

Course Details:
Duration: 5 hours
CEU Credits: 3.5
Format: Interactive online with weather scenario planning

Target Release: Q2 2025

Master international safety standards and regulations for adventure tourism and entertainment facilities operating in multiple jurisdictions or serving international guests. Learn to navigate complex compliance requirements across different regulatory frameworks.

Course Details:
Duration: 4 hours
CEU Credits: 3.0
Format: Online with regulatory framework comparisons

Target Release: Q4 2025

Develop expert-level skills in incident investigation, root cause analysis, and corrective action implementation. Learn advanced investigative techniques, evidence collection methods, and how to create actionable improvement plans that prevent future incidents.

Course Details:
Duration: 5 hours
CEU Credits: 4.0
Format: Interactive case-based learning

settings.content_body: Every AAI course follows our proven development methodology, ensuring the highest quality professional education experience. We work with industry leaders, safety experts, and educational specialists to create courses that deliver real value to your career and organization.

settings.block_content: We begin by researching current industry trends, regulatory changes, and consulting with leading safety professionals to identify critical knowledge gaps and emerging training needs.
Our curriculum development team, composed of industry veterans and educational specialists, creates comprehensive content that balances theoretical knowledge with practical application.
All course content undergoes rigorous peer review by multiple industry experts and safety professionals to ensure accuracy, relevance, and practical applicability.
Selected courses undergo beta testing with AAI members, allowing us to refine content based on real-world feedback before full launch and ongoing updates.

settings.title: Interested in These Upcoming Courses?
settings.text: Contact us to learn more about our course development timeline, early access opportunities, and how to stay informed about new releases. AAI members receive priority access and special pricing on all new courses.
